title: Event data entry
snippet:
1) Collect the following data points:

1. Event Name
2. City
3. Address (Location)
4. Start Date
5. End Date
6. Start time
7. End time
8. Description
9. Price
10. Website
11. Phone Number
12. Images

from the following websites for every event:

http://www.cae.edu.au/course_category/food-beverage/hands-on-cooking/
http://www.cae.edu.au/course_category/food-beverage/demonstration-cooking/
http://www.essentialingredient.com.au/events/locations/prahran/
http://italyonmymind.com.au/cook-with-me/cooking-classes-in-melbourne/
http://www.mylebanesekitchen.com.au/cooking-classes
https://www.enoteca.com.au/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=3&Itemid=36
http://dishdujour.com.au/booking.html
https://www.locavore-studio.com/cooking-classes/
http://southmelbournemarket.com.au/cooking-school/
http://www.relishmama.com.au/cooking-classes.aspx
https://truppcookingschool.com/cooking-classes/
http://gourmetkitchencookingschool.com.au/cooking-classes/
http://www.lacucinadisandra.com.au/wtmschedule/
http://www.savourschool.com.au/classes.aspx
https://shortcourses.angliss.edu.au/
http://www.ganache.com.au/chocolate-school.html
http://www.spicebazaar.com.au/cooking-classes/
http://piperstfoodco.com/en/product-category/cooking-school/
http://www.cookingonthebay.com.au/cooking-classes/
http://www.holmesglen.edu.au/courses/short_courses/food_and_beverage/cookery
http://freetomelbourne.org/cooking-classes/
https://gewurzhaus.com.au/cooking-school/

2) Enter each separate event  into the following wordpress site

http://weekendchef.co/submit-event/
